channel.title: New Job
channel.description:
So, today was the first day of my new job (Coal Miner), I figured I'd take some pictures before we really got started; I can't honestly say I know why I am posting this, but I'm posting it anyway because I'm cool like that. Anyway:
The continuous miner: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/IMG_0004.JPG[/img]
Some of our lights: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/IMG_0009.JPG[/img]
Loader: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/IMG_0003.JPG[/img]
Scoop: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/IMG_0002.JPG[/img]
The Portal: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/IMG_0005.JPG[/img]

item.title: New Job
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

where excatly are you working downtown?, i’m working as summer research student (on spectrography and thermodynamic properties of nanoparticles) @ uoft (st.geroge).
BTW did i mention i get to unconditional access to use Atomic Force Microscope (AFM), Kelvin probe force microscope (KPM) and Electrostatic force microscope (EFM), these things are cooler than those machines lol

Read full topic

item.title: New Job
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Here’s some more pictures I took yesterday:

Shuttle Car: (This is the car that goes underneath the conveyor on the continuous miner and loads up with coal, then takes it to the loader)

The seats on the shuttle car: (It has 2 seats facing in opposite directions, because you can’t really turn around underground so you just drive backward/forward haha)

This is the mantrip, it’s what everyone loads up in to be taken down deep in the mine: (I’ve drove this bitch lol – I don’t know if you can tell, but it’s sitting in the portal of the mine, the mine’s doors are closed though)

This is the first pile of gob we’ve gotten since we got all the belts setup and working:

This is an up close picture of the big-ass fan, it’s loader than fuck:

Here’s where the belt comes out of the mine:

This is the ripper head on the continuous miner, it’s a scary bitch:

Here’s the remote control for the continuous miner:

Here’s the methane monitor on the continuous miner, if it reaches 1% methane, the machines will start beeping letting you know, if it gets to 2% methane, everything shuts down.

Here’s the bobcat, was the first thing I was taught how to use tear

And, last but not least, the loader. I’ll be taught how to drive this bastard soon, and I cannot wait lmao

Read full topic

item.title: New Job
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:31, topic:392017”]YOU ARE A BAD BAD MAN EVIL_!!!

Also more pictures please. :)[/quote]I’m off till Saturday, but I’ll get some pictures of the shuttle car and whatever else I can find lmao; I was sucking up to the section foreman and got to be trained on the mantrips, the main boss of the mine says that I’m a great worker and he’s going to try to talk Rhonda (my supervisor) into putting me underground so I can help him lmao – I think it’s because I always show up on time and shit, for some reason most miners are like fuckin 30 minutes late lol

Read full topic

item.title: New Job
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:27, topic:392017”]GF, Sex and Coal mining or Shooting muslims.

if my KDR got over 10 id, be happy. But he went for the right choice, live long and prosper.[/quote]Haha exactly here in WV, if you walk around with the reflective coal miner clothing, you’re a pussy magnet because they know you have money lmfao

No shit, I’m loving this job, way more than I’ve ever liked programming. I don’t know what it is about it, but it’s so fucking awesome, I think it may just be the cool equipment I get to drive lmfao
